0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE CORN AND OTHER CEREALS RESEARCH INSTITUTE AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01335
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE CORN AND OTHER CEREALS RESEARCH INSTITUTE AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2020-02-12)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2019-12-18
      2. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2020-01-29
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-02-04
          -The Committee agreed to create a technical working group (TWG) that will further deliberate the measures and come up with a substitute bill for the consideration of the Committee. The TWG will be chaired by Rep. Antonio "Tonypet" Albano.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-07-24
